Lyric:
[by:dy2084]

[offset:0]

[00:01.80]What are you waiting for
[00:12.56]What are you waiting for
[00:23.62]What are you waiting for
[00:25.52]Just surrender here tonight
[00:28.92]What are you waiting for
[00:31.18]As we go towards the lights
[00:34.68]When everything is said and done
[00:39.23]Still looking for answers if only one
[00:42.04]Turn my back the urge has gone
[00:45.24]Left with no reason we come undone
[01:08.73]You arrive in the rising sun
[01:13.34]The hidden passenger that I've been taking
[01:19.34]Close your eyes let's forget again
[01:24.15]As you drag me down I will take you in
[01:29.70]What are you waiting for
[01:31.80]Just surrender here tonight
[01:35.31]What are you waiting for
[01:37.31]As we go towards the light
[01:42.46]When everything is said and done
[01:45.26]Still looking for answers if only one

[03:21.14]I am caught in your slow release

[03:36.73]to another time until my head escapes
